title: Chilled avocado summer soup
ingredients: ['2 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '1 tablespoon chopped shallots', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '450ml (16 fl oz) vegetable or chicken stock', '225ml (8 fl oz) double cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tomato - peeled, seeds removed and diced']
